channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18456] Add some tests for HIVE-18367 to check that the table information contains the query correctly
item.description: This cannot be tested with a CliDriver test so add a java test to check the output of 'describe extended', which is changed by HIVE-18367
item.summary: Add some tests for HIVE-18367 to check that the table information contains the query correctly

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12909670 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Test failures look unrelated (not surprisingly as this is a test-only change).  Please can you take a look pvary

Hi asherman,

Thanks for taking care of this test too!

Just one little nit - we should use either a variable, or a constant for table names:

  • Once you use a variable: 
    stmt.execute("create view " + view + " as select * from " + table);
  • Other places you use a constant. For example: 
    extendedViewDescription.contains("viewOriginalText:select * from testDescribe"));

I would prefer to stick with one of the methods.
Otherwise it looks good to me.

Thanks,
Peter

Thanks for your patch asherman!
This jira is resolved and released with Hive 3.0 If you find an issue with it, please create a new jira.
